summary: A space scientist working on a project to communicate with aliens visits a village called Paglapur. To improve the plight of the inhabitants of Paglapur, he comes up with a novel idea.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Sonakshi Sinha|Shreyas Talpade|Minissha Lamba|Alexx O'Nell|Pitobash|Darshan Jariwala|Vrajesh Hirjee|Chitrangda Singh|Vindu Dara Singh|Asrani|Anjan Srivastav|Bikramjeet Kanwarpal|Avtar Gill|Sanjay Mishra|Subodh Desai|Gurpreet Ghuggi|Greg Heffernan|Javed Jaffrey|Mansi Jhingran|Farah Khan|Suzanna Mukherjee|Kajal Pozal|Preetisheel G. Singh|Virhuti Thakur|Wim Van Aerschot
title: Joker
